headline.main: BATAAN HOSPITAL IS BOMBED BY FOE; 'Number of Casualties' Result -- Building, Plainly Marked, Previously Avoided 'SOFTENING' BELIEVED AIM Forts Reply to the Japanese Shore Batteries and Sink Launch in Manila Bay

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 31 -- Bombs dropped by the Japanese on Bataan Peninsula yesterday struck a base hospital and caused "a number of casualties," the War Department announced today in a communique describing continued operations in that Philippine theatre.
abstract: Lt Gen Wainwright repts little damage
